title: Integrative Medicine Consultations
description: Integrative Medicine is defined as the practice of healing in a medical environment where the emphasis is on the integrative use of complementary alternative modalities along with conventional treatments to promote one's natural ability to heal, thus achieving wellness. More information about Integrative Medicine on our website. Meet our Integrative Medicine Provider: Kogan, Mikhail, ... Read more
